text: Lene Lovich (; born Lili-Marlene Premilovich; March 30, 1952) is an English singer, songwriter and musician. She first gained attention in 1979 with the release of her hit single "Lucky Number", which peaked at number 3 on the UK Singles Chart and made her a leading figure of the new wave music scene. title: Lene Lovich
